name: Pow Pow Pew (+ sources)
description:
Controls:

Forward = W  I  Right = D  I  Shoot = Left Click   I  Realod Game = P or Kp Add

Backwards = S  I  Left = A  I  Realod Gun = R   I  Camera = Mouse/ Trackpad

Camera is not inverted

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A game i just started making 5 days ago.

I would like some feedback. Will reply to every comment.

Paint 3D
